title: Bug 23787 - Project Properties Info Page Uses Text Fields Instead of Labels
description: In the Properties dialog for Project Properties, the Info page displays text fields instead of labels, making it look bad on all motif platforms. Integration build 09/17.
OB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog displays text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog should display labels instead of text fields for a better appearance on all motif platforms.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software.
2. Go to the Project Properties dialog.
3. Navigate to the Info page within the dialog.
4. Observe that the Info page uses text fields instead of labels.
